page.title: 12Entertainment
page.content: There is a wide range of{entertainment in Tadcaster. For example, there are the{Youth Clubs,}concerts and discos. The Youth Club caters for a wide age range and there is much to do. There is pool, snooker,darts,table tennis,indoor soccer and other games to play and it is very cheap. There are also organised trips, for example, this year (1985), there is one to Paris. I like the youth club but prefer to go to the pubs and clubs with my Dad as there is plenty of ale and good pool and snooker tables, plus arcade games. The{discos}are very good and often they are run to raise money for{charity} such as the youth club itself or for the Save the Children Fund or for famine relief in Ethiopia
